name: Heartbite: Dating in Daylight
description:
You wake up early, and the sun is already beginning to shed its rays over the skies. But this time you won’t hide away from sunlight. Food’s out after all, and who knows what (or who) you’ll encounter out there? Maybe there is hope for a nocturnal creature such as yourself to find what you’ve been looking for?

Get to know a unique cast of characters as you go through your day in Heartbite: Dating in Daylight! Escape from a dire situation, collect candy and witness a decisive battle as you get closer to them. Behold stunning locations, uncover secrets and get a taste of different genre minigames in this dating sim!

These mini games are a platformer, a physics playground and an old school RPG battle!
